item.title: March 2019
item.description: March 2019 March for us arrived like a lamb with light showers after the dry warm February, sometimes it was like summer The guests leaving after their half term holiday have had a great time enjoying the beautiful weather and we think this is a lovely time to come away on holiday for many reasons. The Daffodils are all out, Primroses and the Hawthorn in the hedges. Finding fossils at Lyme regis and Charmouth can be easy this time of year as with the winter weather there is more uncovered.
